tool.name: ISA to mzXML
tool.description: Extract mzXML files from an ISA dataset and output a collection of mzXML dataset.
tool.help:
==================== ISA to mzXML ====================
Extract mzXML files contained inside an ISA archive.
----- Input -----
ISA dataset ===========
The ISA-Tab dataset from which to extract the files.
------ Output ------
The output is a collection of mzXML files.
